In England, in the seven days to 26 October, there were 246,472 new confirmed cases (435.8 new cases per 100,000). In the seven days to 19 October, there were 273,672 new cases, and so the new cases have decreased by 10% (27,200 fewer cases). The number of confirmed COVID-19 cases in England so far as at 31 October is 7,700,753 (13,617.6 cases per 100,000 population).
